definitions.definition: One that plays. ( gambling ) A gambler . ( historical ) A mechanism that actuates a player piano or other automatic musical instrument. ( electronics ) An electronic device that plays audio or video media. ( computing ) A software application that plays audio or video media, such as a media player .
examples: He is an avid Minecraft player .

subdefinitions.definition: One who plays any game or sport.
examples: He is a player for the Australian team.

subdefinitions.definition: An actor in a dramatic play.
One who plays on a musical instrument .
A gamer ; a person of video games or similar.

definitions.definition: One who is playful ; one without serious aims; an idler ; a trifler .
A participant ; one involved in something.

subdefinitions.definition: One who participates in a particular type of sexual play .

definitions.definition: A person who plays the field rather than having a long-term sexual relationship.

main_definition: One that plays. ( gambling ) A gambler . ( historical ) A mechanism that actuates a player piano or other automatic musical instrument. ( electronics ) An electronic device that plays audio or video media. ( computing ) A software application that plays audio or video media, such as a media player .
secondary_definitions: One who is playful ; one without serious aims; an idler ; a trifler .
A participant ; one involved in something.
( informal ) A person who plays the field rather than having a long-term sexual relationship.
